trends.topic: China’s domestic 14nm 3D-bonded AI accelerator claims performance on par with Nvidia 4nm GPUs
trends.reason: A Chinese team is claiming that a homegrown 14nm AI logic chip using advanced 3D hybrid bonding can rival Nvidia’s cutting-edge 4nm GPUs with a stated 120 TFLOPS, signaling a potentially major shift in AI hardware geopolitics, export-control workarounds, and data center accelerator competition.
trends.search_keywords: China AI chip, 14nm, 3D hybrid bonding, Nvidia GPU, 120 TFLOPS, data center
